content.value:
There's been too much going on lately so I completely forgot to announce that me and #HollysMankyMoggies are moving back to my hometown of Nottingham later this year.

I don't need to be here for work anymore, and lower rent means MOAR SPACE FOR NEEDY MOGS ðŸ¥°
